ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Help needed from players of ALL servers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yes pls, UO2. Lets go in together, same shard pls. yes yes. Make new friends and kakis, doest matter to me who leads. Lets just get in and ENJOY ! I see
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yes pls, UO2. Lets go in together, same shard pls. yes yes.

Make new friends and kakis, doest matter to me who leads. Lets just get in
and ENJOY !
I see around a 100 local EQ kakis? imagine all go in same shard in UO2 at
the same time when the game releases in the first week!!
Sure win liao.

Alex aka bibi


----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 12, 2000 9:04 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Help needed from players of ALL servers!

unstoppable
